forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the evening unfolds beneath a gentle veil of clouds, ushering in a light breeze that carries whispers of the bay. The temperature hovers comfortably, with the promise of a mild night ahead. As the sun descends beyond the horizon, the marine layer lingers just beyond the iconic Golden Gate, hinting at the ever-present dance of fog that the city knows so well. While the visibility stretches across the bay, there’s an ethereal quality in the air, almost as if the city itself is pausing to enjoy the fading light.

Tomorrow greets us with the promise of a sun-kissed morning, transitioning into a pleasantly warm afternoon. The temperatures will dip slightly, inviting a soft layer—perhaps a light jacket or a cozy sweater. It’s the perfect opportunity to explore the cobblestoned streets, perhaps visiting an art gallery or indulging in a quiet café tucked away from the bustling tourist spots. As the day unfolds, those who seek leisure will find it in strolls along the waterfront, where the sound of waves lapping against the shore adds a melodic soundtrack to a day steeped in San Francisco charm.
